## lab snippet list

List personal or project snippets

### Synopsis

List personal or project snippets

```
lab snippet list [remote] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --all          List all snippets
  -h, --help         help for list
  -n, --number int   Number of snippets to return (default 10)
```
